string-array.name: about_content
string-array.item:
%1$s:
Flashcards for Android

AnkiDroid is a flashcard application which is fully compatible with the desktop software Anki. You can create, download and learn material on both AnkiDroid or Anki Desktop, and synchronize them easily with AnkiWeb.
To help us make AnkiDroid better, please report bugs to the issue tracker; new feature ideas are very welcome too. Find answers on the wiki or start a discussion on the forum.
AnkiDroid is open source software, so everyone is encouraged to become a contributor :-)
Non-developers can also help. For instance, you can help translate AnkiDroid, update the wiki, provide screenshots, or blog about AnkiDroid.
AnkiDroid is released under the GNU-GPL v3 license and the source code is available on GitHub.

Delete all cards in %1$s? It contains %2$d cards.

An automatic sync may be triggered in %d seconds

resources.string: Error copying debug information to clipboard

An error occurred while accessing your collection. It may have been caused by a harmless bug, or there may be a problem with it. 

Try running check database, or restoring from backup by pressing the “options” button. If you continue to see this message, please file a bug report:
%1$s
App returned an unexpected value. You may need to use a different app
The system does not have an app installed that can perform this action.
Compute first n days, simulate remainder
Number of iterations of the simulation
You can contribute to AnkiDroid by helping the development team see which features people use

string.comment: After an Android backup is restored, AnkiDroid opens and shows this message. Opening AnkiDroid again will work correctly
string.name: ankidroid_cannot_open_after_backup_try_again

resources.string: Android backup in progress. Please try again
AnkiDroid relies on the System WebView which is unavailable. This can happen if the system is installing updates. Please try again in a few minutes.\n\n%s
Please turn on fullscreen to use Show Navigation Drawer using JavaScript.
Please turn on fullscreen to use Show Options Menu using JavaScript.

Writing to the collection failed. The database could be corrupt or there may not to be enough empty space on disk.

If this happens more often, try checking the database, repairing the collection or restoring it from a backup. Touch “options” for that.
\Or it could be an AnkiDroid bug as well; please report the error so that we can check this.
This card uses unsupported AnkiDroid features. Contact developer %1$s, or view the wiki. %2$s
Sync automatically on app start/exit if the last sync was more than 10 minutes ago.
Backup not saved. Not enough space left on SD card. Lower the backup depth or remove some other files.
Vil du virkelig slette samlingen og lage en ny? Det kommer til å slette all framgangs-informasjonen din, og slette alle kort!
Vil du virkelig skrive over samlingen din med den fra AnkiWeb? Det sletter all fremgangs-informasjonen og informasjon du har lagt til siden siste synkronisering!
The selected backup file was invalid
Ingen sikkerhetskopier for denne samlingen er tilgjengelige på denne enheten. Hvis du har sikkerhetskopier på datamaskinen din, vennligst kopier dem manuelt til AnkiDroid-mappen
Too many reminders scheduled. Some will not appear

resources.string: These changes are applied when the card template is saved

Enter the template that the card browser will use to display your cards. Use this to display a more concise answer.

A front template of
“The capital of {{Country}} is:”
could be compressed in the card browser to
“Capital: {{Country}}”
Could not load Card Browser Appearance
Unable to save card template changes: %s
Removing this card type would cause one or more notes to be deleted. Please create and save a new card type first.
Card Content Error: Failed to load ‘%s’
Card Content Error: Media update required
Database checked and optimized.\nShrunk by %d MB.
Dette kan ta en lang tid
No unused or missing files found
Files used on cards but not in media folder: %d
Files in media folder but not used by any cards: %d
This may take a long time with large media collections

AnkiDroid requires storage permission, which we use exclusively to store your AnkiDroid collection, flashcard media and backups. Our code is open-source, written by volunteers, and trusted by millions.

If you have any questions, please access our in-app manual or visit our support forums.

Thank you for trying AnkiDroid!
—AnkiDroid Development Team
Alle kort som ikke er tilordnet noe vil slettes. Hvis et notat ikke har kort igjen, vil det gå tapt. Er du sikker du vil fortsette?
Draw chessboard from Forsyth–Edwards Notation. The notation must be enclosed in [fen][/fen] tags.

Your collection has become corrupted.

Touch “options” to restore from a backup, or if that doesn’t work, see the following instructions for manually repairing the database:
%1$s

Det finnes en spesiell kortstokk for å studere utenfor den vanlige tidsrammen. Kort vil automatisk bli satt tilbake i de opprinnelige kortstokkene sine etter at du har gått gjennom dem. Ved å slette denne kortstokken fra kortstokklisten, vil alle gjenværende kort bli satt tilbake i de opprinnelige kortstokkene sine.

Edit this note and add some cloze deletions. (%1$s)

Hi!

This is an Anki flashcards deck send from AnkiDroid. Try to open it using one of the available Anki distributions and enjoy easy and efficient learning!
No applications available to handle apkg. Saving...

resources.string: Det har oppstått et problem med AnkiDroid; en rapport sendes nå inn til utviklerne…
Vennligst skriv inn din tilbakemelding, eller informasjon om eventuelle feil du melder inn.

Ansvarsfraskrivelse: Vi samler ikke inn personlig informasjon som e-postadresse, telefonnummer eller telefonens IMEI. Vi samler derimot inn informasjon angående enheten din, som for eksempel produsenten, modellen og Android-versjonen i tillegg til detaljert informasjon om rapporterte feil og hva som ble gjort når og før de oppstod.
Det har oppstått et problem med AnkiDroid; en rapport genereres…

Select the deck in your file manager or visit the about:downloads page to import it
On next sync, force changes in one direction

You must enable gestures to hide the answer buttons

The requested change will require a full upload of the database when you next synchronize your collection. If you have reviews or other changes waiting on another device that haven’t been synchronized here yet, they will be lost. Continue?
Due to a bug in the previously installed version of AnkiDroid, it’s recommended to force a full sync.
Touch gestures will not be processed if a link/hint is pressed.
Allow touch gestures in screen corners
Assign gestures to actions such as answering and editing cards.

resources.string: Vil du virkelig prøve å reparere databasen?\n\nEn kopi vil bli opprettet i undermappen \'%s\' før forsøket starter.
Only new cards can be repositioned
Reschedule for review in x days
A new card is being rescheduled. Rescheduling also turns new cards into review cards. Use the ‘reposition card’ option to change a new card\'s position within the new queue
Rescheduling also resets how the scheduler treats the card in the future (ease will be set to %d%%)
This card will be placed at the end of the new card queue
Reset language assignments (for text to speech and dictionaries) for all decks
Your collection will be replaced with an older copy. Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Disable all animations and use safer method for drawing cards. E-ink devices may require this.
Current image size is %sMB. Default image size limit is 1MB. Do you want to crop it?
Some related or buried cards were delayed until tomorrow
To see them now touch the “Unbury” item in the menu
The experimental scheduler could cause incorrect scheduling. Please ensure you have read the documentation first. Proceed?
This will reset any cards in learning, clear filtered decks, and change the scheduler version. Proceed?
Enable the experimental scheduler. Forces changes in one direction on next sync
Mindre enn %d MB plass igjen på SD-kortet ditt. \nFrigjør litt plass for å unngå tap av data.
Show next review time on answer buttons
Show card counts, flag and mark in top bar
Har du ingen AnkiWeb-konto? Det er gratis!
Note: AnkiWeb is not affiliated with AnkiDroid
Please grant AnkiDroid the ‘Storage’ permission to continue

If you studied every day: %1$.1f minutes/day

resources.string: No mature cards were studied today
Stegantallet må være av tall høyere enn 0

string.comment: Name for a preference category in Filtered deck (aka Cram deck, aka Custom study) options
string.name: study_options

resources.string: For å studere utenfor den vanlige tidsrammen, trykk på \"Tilpassede studier\"-knappen.
Gratulerer! Du er ferdig for i dag.

Det finnes flere nye kort tilgjengelig, men den daglige grensen er nådd. Du kan øke grensen i innstillingene, men vær oppmerksom på at dette også vil øke den kortsiktige mengden av kort til repetering.
Du har nådd grensen for gjennomgang i dag, men det er fortsatt kort du ikke har gått gjennom. For best mulig effekt, bør du vurdere å øke grensen i alternativene.
Denne kortstokken er tom. Bruk +-knappen for å legge til nytt innhold.
Overwrite your collection on the server?

Kortstokkene dine her og på AnkiWeb er så ulike at de ikke kan slåes sammen, så kortstokkene på den ene siden må overskrives av kortstokkene fra den andre.\n\nVil du laste opp kortstokkene herfra, eller laste ned kortstokkene fra AnkiWeb?
Connection timed out. Either your internet connection is experiencing problems, or you have a very large file in your media folder.
Databasen din er ødelagt. Vennligst fiks den før du prøver å synkronisere på nytt.\n\nSee %s for informasjon om å reparere databaser.
Only one client can access AnkiWeb at a time. If a previous sync failed, please try again in a few minutes.
Your collection or a media file is too large to sync.
AnkiWeb encountered an error. Please try again in a few minutes, and if the problem persists, please file a bug report.
Please upgrade to the latest version of AnkiDroid
AnkiWeb is under maintenance. Please try again in a few minutes.
The Custom Sync Server in Advanced Settings is invalid (%s). Please enter a valid server, or disable the setting.
Could not connect to AnkiWeb. Is your internet working?\n\n%s
Hente manglende medier automatisk ved synkronisering.
Det oppstod en feil. Vennligst prøv igjen senere.
Your clock’s off by %1$d seconds%2$s. Make sure that the date, time, and timezone on your phone are set correctly, then sync again.
Feil ved sending av ferdigretning til server
Media sync failed because current database is corrupt. A media check is recommended.
Error while syncing media. A media check is recommended.
Mediesynkronisering fullført, men antallet media er enig det samme som på serveren. Neste mediesynkronisering blir en fullstendig synkronisering, for å rette eventuelle feil.
Den valgte samlingen kunne ikke overskrives med den nedlastede filen.
Den nedlastede databasen var ødelagt. Vennligst prøv på nytt.
After syncing, the collection was in an inconsistent state. To fix this problem, AnkiDroid will force a full sync. Choose which side you would like to keep.
Change the sync icon when changes can be uploaded
For stor trafikk på serveren. Prøv på nytt senere.
Den nedlastede filen kunne ikke lagres på SD-kortet. Enten er SD-kortet ditt skrivebeskyttet, eller så er det ikke nok plass.

Invalid AnkiDroid JS API version. Contact developer %s, or view wiki

Fatal Error: WebView renderer crashed. Cause: %s
System WebView failed to render card \'%1$s\'.\n %2$s
The WebView was terminated by the system. This typically happens when the application runs out of memory, often due to large fonts or media.
This was caused by an internal error in the WebView
